entry.title: [RBX8/SG3][Storage and Backups] - NASHA
entry.content:
Jan 11, 01:44 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/01/2023 10:00 UTC
End Time : 11/01/2023 01:27 UTC
Root cause : The incident was due to a network issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 11, 01:20 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/01/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : NASHA SERVICE in SBG3 and RBX8 unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [BHS][VPS] - deliveries and services pertubations
entry.content:
Jan 11, 03:21 UTC
Update - The incident with vRacks is still open but there is significant progress since the last update.
Our technical teams remain working on the issue.

Jan 11, 01:31 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 11, 01:27 UTC
Update - The issue with vRacks has been identified.
Our technical teams are hands on the issue.
We are checking the whole vRack infrastructure. Investigations are still ongoing.

Jan 11, 01:24 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 10/01/2023 23:30 UTC
Service impact : You might experience some perturbation or unavailability on deliveries, volumes, and snapshots.
Related Incident: [Global][vRack Private Network] - vRack outage
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: VPS - GRA6 - host1387188
entry.content:
Jan 11, 00:02 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jan 10, 23:41 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected hosts

host1387188

The list of instances listed below are currently
unavailable, due to hardware fault on the hypervisor(s) previously mentioned. We apologize for
